title: Moto Ondoso
desc:
Using the Moto Ondoso visualization, users can view key information about boat traffic patterns in Venice. The digital map highlights boat stops, which can be clicked on in order to view graphics related to traffic patterns at each location. Additionally, users can toggle percentages of traffic reductions in order to see how common boat traffic is in specific places under certain conditions.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
